text: The 1948–49 Segunda División season was the 18th since its establishment and was played between 11 September 1948 and 17 April 1949. ==Overview before the season== 14 teams joined the league, including two relegated from the 1947–48 La Liga and two promoted from the 1947–48 Tercera División. ;Relegated from La Liga: *Real Sociedad *Real Gijón ;Promoted from Tercera División:''' *Real Santander *Gerona ==Teams== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align: left;" !
